short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Control video/audio playback with just a click, works on YouTube, Pinterest, and other sites.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Enhance your media control with an extension that comes with a cool UI and features like AutoPlay, Pause, and Play. Built specifically for Pinterest web users, it works across all video and audio streaming platforms, including YouTube.

Whether you're in a study session or just relaxing, the extension allows seamless autoplay for videos and audio. While many music platforms support repeat songs, it can be difficult on some. Now, with our extension, that difficulty is a thing of the past.
